title: King Charles diagnosed with cancer and has started treatment, Buckingham Palace says
description: The King has been diagnosed with cancer and has started treatment today, Buckingham Palace has announced. His diagnosis comes following treatment in hospital for an enlarged prostate, although the palace said he does not have prostate cancer. The palace has not confirmed what type of cancer the 75-year-old monarch has.

title: 'Out of touch' Rishi Sunak blasted for £1,000 Rwanda deportations bet with Piers Morgan
